summary: Combat Ranger Follower based on my first Character now RIP played all Vanilla and Dawnguard quests with him. Added some perks and he is Marriageable. Full Nightingale Set included (no head).
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/3552857-1498676311.jpg[/img]
------------------------------------------------
Combat Ranger Follower based on my first Character now RIP played all Vanilla and Dawnguard quests with him.
Added some perks and he is Marriageable. Full Nightingale Set included (no head). Level cap removed (going with player).
You can find him along with the companions in Whiterun.
------------------------------------------------
Blades man 90
Barbarian
Agile Defender
Assassin Blade
Bulseye
Criticalshot 90
Deepwounds 90
Dual Savagery
Hunter Discipline
Muffled Movement
Paralyzing strike
Power Shot
Ranger
[youtube]cJznslUek9o[/youtube]
Credits:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiHair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488#content]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles[/url].
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Cover eyes[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/5035689/?]EmadWasfi[/url] for the fantastic video showcase.
------------------------------------------------
Recomended:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13571]Dual Wield for Followers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17746]DSpSoB - Dual Sheath plus Shields on Back[/url]
------------------------------------------------
Thank you to:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3476923]Gweneal[/url] for her full support and Beta testing.
------------------------------------------------
